response.overview: A young woman named Maggie - knows she isn’t crazy. She’s also not particularly motivated or skilled, but she is not crazy. She knows her body, and she knows that she is the next Virgin Mary. Except, her body is growing something that seems much, much more sinister. Can she survive a doubtful friend, a conniving nurse, and her own body - or will she succumb to her "baby"?
response.title: Immaculate Perception
